name: Orange Man
description:
Control Orange Man and save the land from the evil S. W. A. M. P!

This is a short and simple game that shouldn't take that long to beat.

Parts of this game were planned before the 2020 election, way before Orange Man hinted that he'll run again in 2024. This game is not an endorsement or advertisement for his 2024 run.

Created with the Godot game engine. Orange Man is inspired by "The Story of Zeldo" by Alanxoc3 (for PICO-8), which is inspired by "The Legend of Zelda" by Nintendo. All code, art, music, and sound effects were created by me.

A complete playthrough of the game can be seen here: Orange Man: Complete Playthrough - YouTube
